alert.note: Alert for George (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 5:47PM CDT until June 12 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... East central George County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 547 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of Gulfcrest, or 11 miles southwest of Citronelle, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Saraland, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Creola, Chunchula, Gulfcrest, Axis, Semmes, I65 And I165, Mobile Regional Airport, Wilmer and I65 And AL 158. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
